issue.title: Wrong text in button displayed for requests "done"
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In view=requests when filter "completed" is selected (see screenshot), the button on right hand has text "Answer" (Répondre) which is wrong since the request is already completed.

It should display another button with text "Open" (Ouvrir)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
